name: yelp_search
description: Search for businesses on Yelp. Returns up to 15 results with name, rating, review count, category, price range, address, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="serp-ia-card"], [class*="container"][class*="hoverable"], [class*="businessName"]'); const cards = items.length > 0 ? items : document.querySelectorAll('[class*="search-result"], li[class*="border"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 15); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="businessName"] a, h3 a, a[href*="/biz/"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="star"][aria-label], [class*="rating"], [role="img"][aria-label]'); const reviewCountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="reviewCount"], [class*="review-count"]'); const categoryEl = el.querySelector('[class*="category"] a, [class*="priceCategory"] a'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="priceRange"], [class*="price-range"]'); const addressEl = el.querySelector('[class*="secondary"] address, [class*="address"], address'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="yelp"], img'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/biz/"]'); results.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || ratingEl.textContent.trim()) : '', review_count: reviewCountEl ? reviewCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', category: categoryEl ? categoryEl.textContent.trim() : '', price_range: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', address: addressEl ? addressEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, location: '{{location}}', result_count: results.length, results: results }
